attributes.action: CHECK EVERYONE AT AIRPORT AND BORDERS FOR CORONAVIRUS
attributes.additional_details: Even though no symptoms are shown straight away, even if we complete the checks, it can eliminate those who are sick and not following the rules to self isolate themselves. Every country i have visited are doing these check, not just at their borders but every public place. Why are we not doing this? Also this is a respiratory disease, washing out hands is not enough.... face masks will help!!
attributes.background: We are allowing anyone into the UK from any country without checking them for the virus Don’t you think it’s completely insane that COVID19 is the worst virus we have ever seen globally Numbers are rising rapidly, more deaths daily Health officials have stated it will get worse before it gets better
